text: While You Were Sleeping is a 1995 American romantic comedy movie directed by Jon Turteltaub. It stars Sandra Bullock as Lucy, a Chicago Transit Authority worker and Bill Pullman as Jack, the brother of a man whose life she saves, along with Peter Gallagher as Peter, the man who is saved, Peter Boyle and Glynis Johns as members of Peter's family, and Jack Warden as longtime family friend and neighbor. The movie was released on April 21, 1995 to positive reviews. ==References== Category:1995 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies shot in Chicago Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies directed by Jon Turteltaub
